p: Acacia longifolia flower cover was not linearly correlated with the number of flowers, oppositely to L. fendleri, indicating that there is a need to develop better methods to estimate A. longifolia flowering. This lack of correlation is likely explained by variability of the structure and variability of A. longifolia flowering. Considering the potential advantages that may come from the improvement of this approach in field conditions, future works should address these challenges and limitations opening a broader field of applications.
